text:
PES; Information re. WBBM series, "THE SEVENTH CONTINENT"
The series is presented on alternate Thursdays from 7»30
to 8:00 p.ra., and is documentary in nature.
Here are the program titles available at this time;
"Cambodia....Eyes On Indo-China"
"Japan.......The Japanese M«nd"
"Poland.The Spirit of Poland"
"Finland.....Nation on a Tightrope"
"Turkey......Bridge To The East"
"Scotland....The Call of the Pipes"
"Israel......Out of the Desert"
The eighth program will feature a cultural study of Italy.
The series will run at least 13 and possibly more according
to present plans.
Throughout the series no attempt at an editorial stand will
be made.
Each individual program will bring forth some of the outstanding
highlights of the country’s history, its growth, and a
review of present day conditions.
Normally, personal appearances are made on the programs by
people from the country being discussed.
